articles.title: The closest divorcées EVER? How Sarah Ferguson fulfils her promise to 'always stand by' Andrew - Daily Mail
articles.description: FEMAIL takes a look back at how Andrew and Sarah have become the closest ex-couple in the Royal Family's history - after she joined the Duke at the Windsor concert last night.
articles.content:
They've been divorced for over 27 years now - but that hasn't stopped Prince Andrew and Sarah Ferguson from maintaining an exceptionally close relationship.
